text:
Virgil is a city in Greenwood County, Kansas, United States. In 2010, 71 people lived there.
History.
The first post office in Virgil was created in 1863. The community may be named after Virgil, New York.
Geography.
Virgil is at (37.980603, -96.011090). According to the United States Census Bureau, the city has a total area of, all of it land.
Climate.
Virgil has hot, humid summers and generally mild to cool winters. The Köppen Climate Classification system says that Virgil has a humid subtropical climate, abbreviated "Cfa" on climate maps.
2010 census.
The 2010 census says that there were 71 people, 35 households, and 21 families living in Virgil.
